email_body:
Dear Patricia,

We are reaching out to inform you about an important update regarding the SafeSecurity platform.

In order to ensure the highest level of security, we kindly request that you click on the following link to update your account settings: Click Here

This update is critical to maintaining the integrity of our system and protecting your data.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,
John Mitchell
Senior Security Specialist
SafeSecurity
